name: Craft Mods - Mod Craft edition
description:
*** ULTIMATE GUIDES, TUTORIALS & CHEATS FOR MODS FROM MINECRAFT ***
*** TEKKIT, IndustrialCraft, BuildCraft, RedPower ... Quizzes, exp calc, tips, emc values ***
Walkthroughs, tutorials, items, maps, video tips, strategies to beat your friends and more.
** Game center integrated for Quiz **
* Try to be the best in the world!

+ Crafting guides
+ Tutorials
+ Videos
+ Info
+ Chat
+ Quiz
+ Emc values
+ Experience calculator
****

MODS:
+ Tekkit
+ Industrial craft
+ BuildCraft
+ Equivalent Exchange
+ REdPower
+ RailCraft
+ Forestry
+ Mo' Creatures
+ Farming cart
+ ThaumCraft

*****ADDITIONAL BONUS:
+ All EMC values
+ Experience calculator
+ Tips
+ Minecraft Trivia quiz
+ Tekkit quiz

* Works on iPhone, iPod Touch & iPad - iOS 8.0 and higher

***
This app will help you with mods in Minecraft without having to get out of Minecraft. You can look on your iPhone/iPad/iPod and learn what is what for and how you get it.
***
"Minecraft" is a trademark of Mojang AB. This unofficial app is only a reference guide for mods in Minecraft.
